androidx.core.app

Class ComponentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • androidx.core.app.ComponentActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FragmentActivity

    public class ComponentActivity
extends Activity
implements LifecycleOwner
    Base class for activities that enables composition of higher level components.

    Rather than all functionality being built directly into this class, only the minimal set of lower level building blocks are included. Higher level components can then be used as needed without enforcing a deep Activity class hierarchy or strong coupling between components.

      • putExtraData

        public void putExtraData(ComponentActivity.ExtraData extraData)
        Store an instance of ComponentActivity.ExtraData for later retrieval by class name via getExtraData(java.lang.Class<T>).

        Note that these objects are not retained across configuration changes

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
